description.en:
CryptoFlow is a fully formed company the aims to provide Fiat to Crypto transfers in minutes for as little as 2% fees

What coins are available?
We have over 100+ Altcoins and Bitcoin available

Are you an Exchange?
No, our aim is to help people facilitate getting involved in the Crypto market quickly but without having to pay the extortionate charges that some currently charge. Up as high as 10%.
